info.title: Inverter (IEC 61850)

inverter.name: inverter
inverter.description: This Resource describes functions for the control and monitoring of IEC 61850 based circuit breaker.

status.name: status
status.description: The inverter status. The status can only be reset out of bounds.

ratedpower.name: ratedpower
ratedpower.description: The rated power in kW, defined at manufacturing time.

minvoltmppt.name: minvoltmppt
minvoltmppt.description: Minimum voltage for MPPT (Maximum power point tracking) control method (V), defined at manufacturing time.

maxvoltmppt.name: maxvoltmppt
maxvoltmppt.description: Maximum voltage for MPPT (Maximum power point tracking) control method (V), defined at manufacturing time.

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Resolution in 1/100 second.
